definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[כִּסֵּא]], [[כִּסֵּה]]:133 n.m.:2Sa 7:16 seat of honour, throne (NH id.; Ph. (pl.) [[כרסים]]; Aram. [[כּוּרְסְיׇא]], kuwrso0; BAram. [[כָּרְסֵא]], Zinj. [[כרסא]] DHM:Sendsch. 58. 44; Ar. kursiy=un; but As. kussu; perh. Akkad. loan-word; ideogr. iṣ GU. ZA, cf. Dl:HWB 343);—abs. [[כִּסֵּא]] Ge 41:40 +; [[כִּסֵּת]] 1Ki 10:19, 1Ki 10:19, Job 26:9, [[הַכִּסֶּא]] Ez Eze 1:26; cstr. [[כִּסֵּא]] 2Sa 3:10 +, [[כֵּס]] Ex 17:16 (si vera l.; v. infr.); sf. [[כִּסְאִי]] 1Ki 1:13 +, [[כִּסְאְֲ]] 2Sa 7:16 +, [[כִּסְאְֶָ]] 1Ki 5:19 +, [[כִּסְאוֹ]] Ex 11:5 +; pl. [[כִּסְאוֹת]] Ps 122:5, Ps 122:5; sf. [[כִּסְאוֹתָם]] Ez Eze 26:16, Is 14:9; —seat of honour, usually

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: of king = throne Ge 41:40 (E), Ex 11:5, Ex 12:29 (both J) 1Ki 2:19, Is 47:1, Ez Eze 26:16; of queen-mother 1Ki 2:19 b; [[מַלְכוּתוֹ]] ´[[כ]] Es 5:1 his royal throne; of future (Messianic) prince Zec 6:13 a (in v:b read [[על־ימינו]] LXX Sta:ZAW 1881, 10); of dead kings in She’ôl Is 14:9; ´[[נׇתַן כ]], in, or against a place, said of king himself, (only Je) is a sign of conquest (Je 1:15); so ´[[שִׂים כּ]] Je 43:10, and (of ´[[י]]) Je 49:38; in Ju Jdg 3:20, though of king, not seat of office; 12 t. elsewhere, lit. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: throne of ´[[י]] ([[אלהים]]) as heavenly king, Is 6:1, Ez Eze 1:26, Eze 1:26, Eze 10:1, 1Ki 22:19 = 2Ch 18:18; Job 26:9, Ps 11:4, Is 66:1 heaven is my throne; as seat of judgment Ps 9:5, Ps 9:8; in oath [[יׇד עַלכּכֵּס יׇהּ]] Ex 17:16 (cf. Di; > Cler JDMich Ges Buhl SS [[נֵס]] banner; LXX krufai/a √ [[כסה]], favours [[כס]]); Jerusalem called throne of ´[[י]] Je 3:17, so the sanctuary Je 17:12 ([[כָּבוֹד מָרוֹם]] ´[[כ]]), Ez Eze 43:7. †

of high priest 1Sa 1:9, 1Sa 4:13, 1Sa 4:18; of honoured guest 2Ki 4:10; of governor Ne 3:7; of (unjust) judge [[הַוּוֹת]] ´[[כ]] Ps 94:20; = conspicuous seat (lit.) Pr 9:14; = seat of distinction, explicitly [[כָּבוֹד]] ´[[כ]] Is 22:23; ´[[כ]] alone 2Ki 25:28, 2Ki 25:28 = Je 52:32, Je 52:32, Es 3:1.

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: fig. = royal dignity, authority, power, [[הַמֶּלֶח וְכִסְאוֹ נׇקִי]] 2Sa 14:9; ´[[לְדָוִד וּלְזַרְעוֹ וּלְבֵיתוֹ וּלְכ]] 1Ki 2:33; esp. kingdom, c. vbs. of setting up, establishing, ´[[י]] subj., [[דָוִד]] ´[[הֵקִים כ]] 2Sa 3:10, [[כִסְאֲ ְוּבָנִיתִי]] Ps 89:5, so c. [[שִׂים]] v:Ps 89:30; king subj., [[בַּחֶסֶד כִּסְאוֹסָעַד]] Pr 20:28; pass. [[דָוִד יִהְיֶה נכִון]] ´[[כ]] 1Ki 2:45 the throne of David shall be established, cf. 2Sa 7:16 = 1Ch 17:14; ´[[וְהוּכַן בַּחֶסֶד כ]] Is 16:5 (of Mess. reign); so (in gen.) ´[[בִּחְדָקָה יִכּוֹן כ]] Pr 16:12, cf. Pr 25:5, Pr 29:14; intrans. (c. [[הָיׇה]]) Ps 89:37; more fully, ´[[י]] subj., [[מַמְלַכְתּוֹ]] ´[[וְכׂנַנְתִּי אֶת־כ]] 2Sa 7:13 ([[כּׂנֵן כסאו]] in ‖ 1Ch 17:12), [[מַמְלַכְתְּ ְעַ־]] ´[[יִשְׂרָאֵלוַהֲקִמׂתִי אֶת־כ]] 1Ki 9:5, cf. ‖ 2Ch 7:18 and ´[[מַלְכוּתוֹ עַל־יִשְׂרָאֵלוַהֲכִינוֹתִי כ]] 1Ch 22:10; also ´[[מגּר כ]] Ps 89:45 cast down throne, of Gentile nations ´[[מַמְלָכוֹתוְהָפַכְתִּי כ]] Hag 2:22; ´[[יׇשַׁב על־כ]] sit on the throne of any one (esp. David) = be his successor 1Ki 1:13, 1Ki 1:17, 1Ki 1:20, 1Ki 1:24, 1Ki 1:27, 1Ki 1:30, 1Ki 1:35, 1Ki 1:48, 1Ki 2:12, 1Ki 3:6, 2Ki 13:13, esp. Je 13:13, Je 17:25, Je 22:2 + 5 t. Je; [[לָָח]] ´[[יֵֽשְׁבוּ לְכ]] Ps 132:12; more fully 1Ch 29:23; † caus. ´[[הוֹשִׁיב על־כ]] 1Ki 2:24, 1Ki 5:19, 2Ki 10:3; ´[[הׂשִׁיב לַכּ]] fig. Job 36:7, of placing in honour; [[לָָח]] ´[[מִפְּרִי בִטְנְ ְאָשִׁית לְכ]] Ps 132:11; † [[ישׁב]]´[[על־כ]] also = take one's seat as king, become actual king, possess royalty 1Ki 16:11, oft. sit on the throne of Isr. 1Ki 8:20, 1Ki 8:25 = 2Ch 6:10, 2Ch 6:16, 1Ki 10:9, 2Ki 10:30, 2Ki 15:12, Je 33:17; without [[ישׁב]] 1Ki 2:4, 1Ki 9:5, cf. also Is 9:6 (Mess.); [[ישׁב על־כסא מַמְלַכְתּוֹ]] De 17:18, [[על־כסא הַמְּלוּכָה]] 1Ki 1:46, and even [[עַל־יִשְׂרָאֵללָשֶׁבֶת]] ´[[עַל־כִּסֵּא מַלְכוּת י]] 1Ch 28:5; also [[הַמְּלָכִים ישׁב]] ´[[עַל־כ]] 2Ki 11:19, ‖[[הַמַּמְלָכָה]] ´[[כ]] 2Ch 23:30; of (royal) throne as judgment seat Pr 20:8, cf. also Ps 122:5; set one upon the throne of Isr. ´[[ישׂ]] ´[[על־כ]] ´[[נתן פ]] 1Ki 10:9 cf. ‖ 2Ch 9:8; in compar. sentence ´[[יְגַדֵּל אֶת־כִּסְאוֹ מִכּ]], i.e. make him a more powerful king than, 1Ki 1:37, cf. v:1Ki 1:47; of king of Babylon, [[מִמַּעַל לְכוֹכְבֵי־אֵל אָרִים כִּסְאִי]] Is 14:13. In Ps 45:7 ´[[כִּסְאֲ ְאלהים וגו]] the text is prob. corrupt: AE Hi Ew Bae read thy throne is (a throne) of God; Bi Che insert [[הקימונכונה יסודתו]] thy throne [its foundation is firmly fixed], God [has established it]; v. further Dr:§ 194, Obs.. †
